name: Knight Roland
description:
Calm, quiet morning. Dew is slowly beginning to shine in the light of the lazily rising sun. Suddenly, a terrifying roar wakes you up from your sleep. You don your armor quickly, you grab a sword and run to see what's going on. (…) 

You look at the destruction, you see burning buildings and a huge hole in the tower. In the tower where your beloved, whose hand you have been seeking for so long, resides. It's a dragon! Suddenly you see it in all its glory. It just took off from the nearby castle walls. In its claws monster is holding her - Princess Leia. Without thinking, you go after the dragon to save your love.
A medieval world full of fairy-tale monsters, secrets and traps is open to you. Go into the unknown and save your beloved - Princess Leia from the clutches of a fearsome dragon.

Play Knight Roland today, take on the role of a brave knight and save the princess. There are dozens of levels ahead of you, and with them more and more challenges. Two types of levels - escape and parkour will make the game even more interesting. Who will save the beautiful woman if not you?
